name: Recorder madness
description:
Attention: This game is NOT playable with conventional controls - mouse / controller. You play the game with a RECORDER - musical instrument.

Recorder - the musical instrument

I'm writing this so you don't get frustrated that it doesn't work :)

Other musical instruments are unfortunately not supported, but you can try to whistle your way through some of the levels!

You have to allow microphone to be used in order for the game to function.
